content:
Whenever you close your eyes, you see the thundering, shimmering waterfall dancing in your mind. You’ve been carrying this large seed to the Cerulean Curtain … and you can’t remember why?

RANGERS CHOOSE

A) Continue helping the seed. Discard all   from the Seed. You must bring the Seed to the Cerulean Curtain to help it.

B) Stop … actually, why don’t you continue helping the seed? Discard all   from the Seed. You must bring the Seed to the Cerulean Curtain to help it.
